instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine the first seven ingredients in mixing bowl and blend well. Pour
into greased and lightly floured 9 ½ inch bunt pan. Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until cake springs back
when lightly touched. Combine 6 tablespoons amaretto and confectioner’s sugar. While the cake is still
warm in pan, poke holes in the cake; pour liqueur mixture over. Allow to cool in pan before removing.

*(If making five small loaf cakes, bake 35 minutes or until a sharp knife comes out clean.)*
ingredients: 1 package (6 ounces) instant vanilla pudding mix
name: Golden Amaretto Cake
